snippet: An article in Die Welt am Sonntag said many European Union functionaries make more than Chancellor Angela Merkel.
abstract: German newspaper Die Welt am Sonntag reports that many European Union functionaries make more than Chancellor Angela Merkel; European Commission spokesman says figures are flawed and no official earns more than she; article comes days ahead of European Union summit meeting over proposed seven-year budget.
lead_paragraph: An article in Die Welt am Sonntag said many European Union functionaries make more than Chancellor Angela Merkel.
